label: 貝原益軒
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: (1630-1714) Scholar known for his development of agronomy for the peasantry.  [He wrote]on such varied subjects as ethics for commoners, childbearing, education for women, and even the natural history of plants and minerals in Japan (p. 621-622).
